Accessibility: Road accessible, elephant rides available, some stairs involved

Still residence of Jaipur royal family, textile gallery, armory museum
UNESCO World Heritage Site, world's largest stone sundial, 18th-century astronomical instruments

Special Notes: Largest palace complex in Rajasthan, panoramic lake views, crystal gallery

Timings: Open 24 hours (living fort), monuments 9 AM to 6 PM

Guided Tours: Desert camps provide guides and cultural programs

Special Notes: Famous for camel safaris, desert camping, cultural folk performances, sand dune adventures

Accessibility: Road accessible, elevators available, zip-line adventure

World's largest private residence, part heritage hotel, built with golden sandstone, vintage car collection

Special Notes: Holy pilgrimage site, only Brahma temple in world nearby, Pushkar Camel Fair in November

Timings: 6:30 AM to 1:30 PM, 3:00 PM to 9:00 PM

Accessibility: Walking distance from lake, steps to climb

Timings: 6:30 AM to 10:00 AM, 2:30 PM to 5:30 PM

Accessibility: Road accessible, some trekking required inside

Unconquered fort, Mughal-Gujarati-Rajput architecture mix, museum with royal artifacts
Asia's largest camel research center, camel milk products available, research on camel breeding
